description: An one-time charge is levied once. An example is an activation fee.
title: oneTimeCharge

___name.description: The name the One-Time Charge is known by (e.g., Activation Fee).

$eref.description: A base / value business entity used to represent money.
$eref.title: money

___amount.description: A floating point number representing the money amount.

___price.description: The amount of money that characterizes the price.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, oneTimeCharge.
